events.text: So, tell me about yourself?
I’m here to serve my role in restoring the world from your mistake.
Whatever plan you decide to fix that I’ll follow.
My commitment to completing the mission will see us through no matter what.
Okay...

events.choice: Why are you with Gaia's Advocates?

events.text: Why are you here with Gaia's Advocates?
The nuclear missile you 'stopped' exploded over my homeland.
Many people blame our people for inciting the first missile launch, but they were religious extremists only  threatening to do so.
No one knows who actually did it, but it definitely wasn’t them.
Regardless, it completely devastated our people, but a few of the strong survived as altered.
Instead of hiding in some hole waiting for everything to get fixed, I decided to make change with my own hands.
To clear my people’s name and take care of the earth as our religion has always taught us.
I understand what you mean.
Why do we need to do this?
We’re not the only ones on the planet trying to survive.
We should leave that responsibility to someone else more capable.
Not a band of barely even adults.
You really are the worst...
Camille's respect for you has fallen.
Alistair said everyone had a skill. What’s yours?
I can scout out the Nuclear plant for its layout, but I won’t return until we begin the infiltration.
During the infiltration, if we haven’t alerted anyone’s attention, I can stealthily neutralize an enemy.
Being altered allows me to fight up close in combat.
Leo fights from a distance and usually supports me.
If Julius has shifted to his altered state he can fight with me, but…
But?
That’s all I have to say.
Let's go then. Gaia needs us.

metadata.name: 1.2.1 Getting to Know Your Team Camille
